1101010100001110 1011011011110001 1 -> sum: 1000110000000000, cout: 1
1000011100000110 1001001011100111 0 -> sum: 0001100111101101, cout: 1
0000001100001010 1011010110001110 1 -> sum: 1011100010011001, cout: 0
0001000000000001 0101000100001000 1 -> sum: 0110000100001010, cout: 0
0001000001011001 0010101011010000 1 -> sum: 0011101100101010, cout: 0
1101101001100110 0010000101011111 1 -> sum: 1111101111000110, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
1111111111111110 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111110, cout: 1
